title: ornate, really fanciful font needed! very pretty and frivolous.....
content:
if someone could help me it would be very very appreciated.  
i have searched high and low!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [help.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111001457/http:/typophile.com/files/help_3.jpg) | 59.79 KB |

 [‹ Marc by Marc Jacobs Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111001457/http:/typophile.com/node/37978 "Go to previous forum topic") [Specimen Aural Test ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111001457/http:/typophile.com/node/37980 "Go to next forum topic")
author: elke@mixxo.com.au

comments.content:
What magazin is this from?  
I’m pretty sure we had this before.

Here it is:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/34584](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111001457/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34584 "http://www.typophile.com/node/34584")  
But no cigar.
A little less geometrically rigid, but you might also like [Graceful Ghost](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111001457/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-GRGH).

This isn’t the same but it is somewhat similar.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/buxotic/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111001457/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/buxotic/regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/buxotic/regular/")

Sharon
